meanings.sent1: She looked even panickier than before when the thunderstorm started.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise made him feel panickier than he had ever felt.
meanings.sent3: Seeing a spider made her panickier than a cat seeing a cucumber.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley felt panickier than a haunted house on Halloween night.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the forest grew panickier with each step she took.

meanings.sent1: The situation was getting panickier as more people started to worry.
meanings.sent2: She became panickier as the deadline for the project approached.
meanings.sent3: His attempts to juggle too many tasks left him feeling even panickier than a squirrel in a nut shop.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was panickier than a mouse in a room full of cats.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds grew panickier, signaling an impending downpour.
